old:
竜武具を分解すると
竜武具の強化に必要な素材の一部が入手できます
不要な武具は素材に分解し、強化に使いましょう

また、強化に使う素材は
新たな竜武具と交換することも可能です
new:
When you break down Dragon Equipment, you can obtain some of the materials needed to strengthen Dragon Equipment. 

Disassemble any unnecessary equipment into materials and use them for strengthening. 

Additionally, the materials used for strengthening can also be exchanged for new Dragon Equipment.
